```{r knitr-opts, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
    fig.height = 3
)
```

```{r setup, collapse = TRUE}
library(microCTr)
library(dplyr)
library(here)
```

```{r read-data, collapse = TRUE}
key <- read_key_excel(here(params$data))

trab <- read_trabecular_excel(here(params$data), key)

cort <- read_cortical_excel(here(params$data), key)

mfe <- read_mfe_excel(here(params$data), key)
```

# Femoral Metaphysis

## Trabecular {.tabset}

### Results

```{r f-met-tb-res, results = "asis"}
F.Met.Tb <- trab |> 
    filter(Site == "Met")

F.Met.Tb_res <- compare_genotypes(F.Met.Tb)
print_results(F.Met.Tb_res)
```

### Data

```{r f-met-tb-dat, results = "asis"}
print_genotype_data(F.Met.Tb)
```

### Combined Sexes

```{r f-met-tb-combined, results = "asis"}
F.Met.Tb |> 
    mutate(Sex = "B") |> 
    compare_genotypes() |> 
    print_results()
```

### Plots

```{r f-met-tb-plot}
plot_genotypes(F.Met.Tb) |> print_plots()
```
